techResume.name: EN - Soffware Engineer
techResume.aboutMe: With nearly five years of experience as a software engineer, I've been involved in more than 20 different projects, including some with prominent companies in the Brazilian market. Throughout this journey, I've gained hands-on experience in applying best practices, creating value for companies through high-performance, scalable, and resilient applications.

strengths.name: Self-taught Person
strengths.description: Powered by Internet: Online Courses, Youtube, Blogs, etc.

strengths.name: Cooperative
strengths.description: Teamwork, with respect and passion for success.

workExperiences.title: Sr. Software Engineer
workExperiences.description:
I was responsible for developing various foreign exchange products and services for the largest bank in Latin America, helping to build cutting-edge solutions to serve millions of customers who access the mobile app every day.

As the main frontend reference of the team, I created standards and guidelines collaboratively and assisted the entire team in building quality and scalable applications.

workExperiences.title: Software Engineer
workExperiences.description:
I worked on developing one of the main products of the largest telecommunications company in Brazil, serving millions of customers who use the services daily.

I participated in the conception and creation of the Design System and the reusable component library for all the company's web applications. I also promoted and implemented a microfrontend architecture for the applications, ensuring lower development costs, greater scalability for teams, and a better user experience.

workExperiences.title: Software Engineer
workExperiences.description:
In this opportunity, I helped build from scratch, from conception to development, a white-label web application for the main product of one of the largest HealthTech companies in the Brazilian market.

Additionally, I worked on the maintenance and creation of new features for the mobile version of the application.

workExperiences.title: Jr. Software Engineer
workExperiences.description:
I worked on the mobile development of the main product of one of the largest HealthTechs in the Brazilian market, responsible for generating millions in revenue for the company in a B2B format.

In this experience, I had the opportunity to be one of the team members to propose and develop a major refactor in the application, aiming at restructuring the legacy code and the architectural project for better app performance. This ensured the resolution of many recurring bugs, leading to a higher app rating in stores, and provided developers with cleaner, clearer code, aiming at better standardization and consequently greater agility in developing new demands.

workExperiences.title: Jr. Full Stack Software Developer
workExperiences.description:
I worked on the development of the Career Platform for the largest private university in the Northeast (Unit), as well as on the development of products and campaigns for the largest bank in the state of Sergipe (Banese).

In this opportunity, I was responsible for improving project maintainability and structuring, restructuring applications using software patterns, implementing best practices, and documenting projects.

educationExperiences.title: Full Stack Development
educationExperiences.lines: Gained skills in full-stack application development, encompassing backend, frontend, NoSQL data persistence, version control, and cloud deployment. Used industry-standard tools to ensure efficient and high-quality development.

techResume.title: Sr. Software Engineer
